channel.title: signiture pic not valid?
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this has been posted before, and i'm sorry if it has, but considering that the forum has no search function i have to ask here. For some reason, after entering ([url]https://steamsigpics.tapgamer.com/steam_statimage.php?p=radioactiveyeti&s=bm[/url]) in the url area i get a message saying, "invalid file".
I checked the FAQ and it simply said where to find the signiture picture and no advice on actually inserting it.
I eventually just gave up and imput the url in the signiture area below. please help, and thanks in advanced.

item.title: signiture pic not valid?

item.description:
Happens to all cockroaches at some point.

Okay, I lied. It doesn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: signiture pic not valid?
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
It has to be something you’re doing wrong. I tried it. It works.
uploading the image defeats the purpose of the tag.

note: You shouldn’t be putting ANYTHING into the field labeled URL it all goes into the big white box when changing the sig.

Read full topic

item.title: signiture pic not valid?
item.dc:creator: Malcontent
item.description:
ok. it didn’t work in internet explorer either. so i copied deathmonkey7’s url without the space and it still said the file was not valid. i tried to just save the image and then just upload it, but it came out really small

Read full topic

item.title: signiture pic not valid?
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
Seeing as I’ve been using Google Chrome since release and never had problems besides with apps or plugins that have not yet been designed for chrome, chrome is not your problem.

Edit: I just tested it, the picture goes fine in signature. Go to the signature area of your User CP and enter [IMG]https://steamsigpics.tapgamer.com/steam_profiles/682a8cdd024ff47e25e5e1b8cb6ccb03.png[/IMG_] (without the _ at the end if [/IMG_]) into the white box and it will show up as an image. And yes, I did this in Google Chrome.

Read full topic

item.title: signiture pic not valid?
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Works fine here. Are you sure you did it right?

Code should be: [IMG]https://steamsigpics.tapgamer.com/steam_statimage.php?p=radioactiveyeti&s=bm[/IMG ]

(without the space at the end)

Read full topic
